\documentclass[12pt,oneside,french]{book}
\usepackage{helvet}
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
\usepackage[utf8]{luainputenc}
\usepackage[a4paper]{geometry}
\geometry{verbose,tmargin=2.5cm,bmargin=2cm,lmargin=2.5cm,rmargin=2.5cm,headheight=1.1cm,headsep=0.5cm,footskip=0.8cm}
\setcounter{secnumdepth}{1}
\setlength{\parindent}{2em}
\usepackage{babel}
\addto\extrasfrench{%
   \providecommand{\og}{\leavevmode\flqq~}%
   \providecommand{\fg}{\ifdim\lastskip>\z@\unskip\fi~\frqq}%
}

\usepackage{setspace}
\onehalfspacing
\usepackage[unicode=true,
 bookmarks=true,bookmarksnumbered=false,bookmarksopen=false,
 breaklinks=false,pdfborder={0 0 0},backref=false,colorlinks=false]
 {hyperref}
\hypersetup{pdftitle={Th√®se de doctorat},
 pdfauthor={Jeanne Drouet}}

\makeatletter

\usepackage{fancyhdr}

\usepackage{array}


\usepackage{bookmark}



 


%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% LyX specific LaTeX commands.
\newcommand{\noun}[1]{\textsc{#1}}
%% Special footnote code from the package 'stblftnt.sty'
%% Author : Robin Fairbairns -- Last revised Dec 13 1996
\let\SF@@footnote\footnote
\def\footnote{\ifx\protect\@typeset@protect
    \expandafter\SF@@footnote
  \else
    \expandafter\SF@gobble@opt
  \fi
}
\expandafter\def\csname SF@gobble@opt \endcsname{\@ifnextchar[%]
  \SF@gobble@twobracket
  \@gobble
}
\edef\SF@gobble@opt{\noexpand\protect
  \expandafter\noexpand\csname SF@gobble@opt \endcsname}
\def\SF@gobble@twobracket[#1]#2{}
%% Because html converters don't know tabularnewline
\providecommand{\tabularnewline}{\\}

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% User specified LaTeX commands.
\usepackage[citestyle=auteurannee_colon,%
bibstyle=auteurannee,%
natbib=true,%
sorting=nyt,%
alldates=long,%
useprefix=true,%
backend=biber]{biblatex}

\bibliography{biblio_these}

\setlength{\bibitemsep}{2ex}

\usepackage{multicol}
\usepackage{lscape}
\usepackage{longtable}
\newcommand{\vpageref}[1]{p.~\pageref{#1}}


\usepackage{chngcntr}
\counterwithout{footnote}{chapter}


% \contentsmargin{0em}
% \dottedcontents{section}[1.5em]{}{2.3em}{1pc}
% \dottedcontents{subsection}[3.8em]{}{3.2em}{1pc}

\usepackage{titlesec}\usepackage{titletoc}


\titlecontents{chapter}[0em]{\addvspace{1pc} }
              {\contentsmargin{0pt}%
              \bfseries \large \chaptertitlename \enspace \thecontentslabel .\enspace%
              }{ \contentsmargin{0pt}%
              \bfseries \large}%
              {\titlerule*[0.32cm]{.} \contentspage }

\titlecontents{part}[0em]{\addvspace{1pc}}
              {\contentsmargin{0pt}%
              \bfseries \Huge Partie  \thecontentslabel .\enspace%
              }{ \contentsmargin{0pt}%
              \bfseries \Huge}%
              {\titlerule*[0.5cm]{.}\contentspage \quad}

\titlecontents{subsection}[2.2cm]{}
              {\normalfont}{\normalfont}%
              {\titlerule*[0.32cm]{.}\contentspage \quad}


\renewcommand*{\thesection}{\arabic{section}.}
%\titlelabel{\thesection.\quad }
\titleformat{\subsubsection}[hang]
  {\normalfont\bfseries\itshape}{}{1em}{}
\titleformat{\paragraph}[hang]
  {\normalfont\itshape}{}{1em}{}
\titlespacing{\paragraph}
  {0em}{.5em}{.5em}
\titleformat{\paragraph}[hang]
  {\normalfont\itshape}{}{1em}{}
\titlespacing{\paragraph}
  {0em}{.5em}{.5em}

\titleformat{\subparagraph}[block]%
  {-- \normalfont { }}{1em}{1em}{}
\titlespacing*{\subparagraph}%
  {2em}{.5em}{.5em}



\newcommand{\conclusion}{%
  \vspace{2ex} \large{}%
  \begin{center}
    $\mathbf{\ast}$ \\
    $\mathbf{\ast}\:$  \quad $\:\mathbf{\ast}$
  \end{center}
  \normalsize{}
  \vspace{2ex} %
}


\sloppy

\DeclareLanguageMapping{french}{francais}
\newcommand{\text}[1]{\\mbox{#1}}

\usepackage{color}


\renewcommand{\chaptermark}[1]{%
  \markboth{#1}{}}

\makeatother
